name: Inside No. 9 (Series 4)
info:
• 中文名: 9号秘事 （第四季）
  • 集数: 6
  • 开始: 2018-01-02
  • 结束: 2018-02-06
  • 类型: 惊悚/悬疑/剧情/黑色喜剧
  • 国家/地区: 英国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 电视台: BBC
  • Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inside_No_9

eps.name: Zanzibar
eps.desc: Told through the style of iambic pentameter, various guests arrive at Hotel Zanzibar where they find themselves interacting with one another in a variety of ways, from murder to a proposal.

eps.name: Bernie Clifton's Dressing Room
eps.name_cn: 伯尼・克利夫顿的化妆室
eps.desc: Double-act, Cheese (Shearsmith) and Crackers (Pemberton), have reunited after 30 years to perform in front of an audience, but an incident that caused them to fall out comes back into the limelight.

eps.name: Once Removed
eps.desc: Removal man Spike (Nick Moran) arrives to help May (Monica Dolan) move house, leading him into bizarre circumstances which unfold through reverse chronology.

eps.name: To Have and To Hold
eps.desc: When Adrian's (Pemberton) career as a wedding photographer starts to get in the way of his own marriage, his wife Harriet (Nicola Walker) is determined to find out why.

eps.name: And the Winner Is...
eps.desc: We join the jury of a television awards company as they decide on who is going to win the Best Actress award. But only one of the eight actresses can be chosen.

eps.name: Tempting Fate
eps.desc: Council contractors Keith (Pemberton), Nick (Shearsmith) and Maz (Weruche Opia) have to clear out the flat of a dead hoarder but when they discover a bloodstained floor, their lives will never be the same again.
